AGENT_BOTS.DESCRIPTION: Agent Bots are like the most fabulous members of your team. They can handle the small stuff, so you can focus on the stuff that matters. Give them a try.You can manage your bots from this page or create new ones using the 'Configure new bot' button.

BOT_CONFIG.ERROR: Harap masukkan konfigurasi bot CSML Anda di atas.
BOT_CONFIG.API_ERROR: Your CSML configuration is invalid. Please fix it and try again.

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Pilih bot agen
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: Tetapkan Bot Agen ke kotak masuk Anda. Mereka dapat menangani percakapan awal dan meneruskannya ke agen manusia jika diperlukan.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not update the agent bot. Please try again.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not disconnect the agent bot. Please try again.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not add bot. Please try again later.

LIST.404: No bots found. You can create a bot by clicking the 'Configure new bot' button â†—

DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus bot ini? Tindakan ini tidak dapat dibatalkan.
